::Scorponok-Lord Zarak::

Scorponok orbits the moon as Zarak learns of what is happening on Earth.

*A next generation of Decepticons are attacking under Starscream's command
*Maximals have arrived to fight the G2 Decepticons

With time Zarak is discovered. At first the G2s look to destroy him and Scorponok do to being part of their past. Zarak talks Starscream into allowing him to become a G2. Scorponok is rebuilt more advanced and scaled down as a G2. The city alt. mode is lost but the scorpion mode is retained. Zarak is still Scorponok's headmaster through mass shifting technology.

Zarak is given a small ship and ordered to Past-Earth to aid Jhiaxus. He is in route.

To be continued...
